about_the_game:
Try to learn all the secrets of the South Cemetery

At first sight it is clear that this cemetery is not simple at all. Your goal is to help Gravy the frog to explore the cemetery and understand the reason why our hero is here.

Game Features

  • Original style, beautiful surroundings and soulful soundtracks.

  • Lots of characters you'll want to learn more about and help them with their problems.

  • Explore the South Graveyard together with the main character, enlarge your map, adding new pieces of this large and mysterious place.

  • Develop as the game progresses! Help Gravy to get back his memories, and with them new abilities, with which you will be invincible!

  • You will have to walk a lot, because this is a metroidvania, perhaps you can miss some secrets, be careful!

  • On your way you will meet not only kind residents of the cemetery, be ready to fight back the enemies and bosses of this graveyard!

  • This cemetery has a big history, as well as its inhabitants, are you ready to go on this big journey and find out all the secrets and intrigues?

name: Gravy the gravedigger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recommend 1080p, 16:9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recommend 1080p, 16:9

short_description: Gravy the gravedigger is a great journey of Gravy the frog through an unknown and mysterious cemetery. However, what brings our hero to such a strange place? Even the little cemetery caretaker doesn't know the reason, and it's up to us to help him in exploring this place.
